content: A cutscene shows the Old Man and the small Buddha talking outside of the tapestries, and you'll return to The Great Pagoda. Finishing this secret area in Chapter 3 will earn you the Azure Dome Transformation, where you can transform into the Stone Monkey.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Chapter_3_Secret-Mount_Mei_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Chapter 3 Secret - Mount Mei Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Mei-Jian Peak' and the sub-subsection 'Erlang Shen'.
The content is as follows:
A cutscene shows the Old Man and the small Buddha talking outside of the tapestries, and you'll return to The Great Pagoda. Finishing this secret area in Chapter 3 will earn you the Azure Dome Transformation, where you can transform into the Stone Monkey.
